Where is Hrant?  
Too far from us for sure!

I know Hrant a bit, he has been a student of mine off and on. I’m guessing, based on previous internet behavior, he has lost interest in the list. Lists tend to get more juvenile as they get older, the serious folks drop out, etc.; the die hards hang in despite the lack of intelligent conversation (and ultimately turn to definitions of word usage). Maybe that is what happened here. Don’t know for sure.

Good night and pleasant dreams.
